block.warriorcats_events.moss_bed.toolti: A comfortable moss nest, lined with feathers, ferns, and flowers.
item.warriorcats_events.dock_leaves.tool: Good for making poultices and wraping herbs
item.warriorcats_events.sorrel_leaves.to: Traveling herb. Used to ease hunger and thirst
item.warriorcats_events.dock_poultice.to: Good for scratches and sore pads\nRight click: Heal a Wild Cat.
item.warriorcats_events.burnet_leaves.to: Traveling herb. Used to give strength
item.warriorcats_events.chamomile.toolti: Traveling herb. Strengthens the heart and soothes the mind
item.warriorcats_events.daisy_leaves.too: Traveling herb. Eases the pain of aching joints
item.warriorcats_events.deathberries.too: Strong scented berries. Other cats say these are deadly
A bundle of sorrel, burnet, chamomile, and daisy. Perfect for traveling
item.warriorcats_events.whiskers.tooltip:
Whiskers allow you to know things about your clanmates!

Right Click: Display Wild Cat's information.
Right Click + Shift: Change a Wild Cat's role.
item.warriorcats_events.warrior_name_ran: Right click: Randomize a Wild Cat's name depending on their age!
item.warriorcats_events.freshkill_and_he: Give this to a Wild Cat to recruit it! Sure they will love it.
item.warriorcats_events.claws.tooltip: Designed by nature to hunt and fight.\nThese will also help gathering plants and leaves without breaking them.\nShift + Right-Click on a Wild Cat to open it's inventory.
item.warriorcats_events.catmint.tooltip: The best remedy for greencough so far.\nVery tasty, it would make you touch the sky!\nGive this to tamed Wild Cats to make them be mates.
item.warriorcats_events.yarrow.tooltip: A not so very good tasting herb. These could make any cat vomit.
Give any name you like to any of your clanmates!\nFormat: '<prefix> <sufix>' or  '<name>'
item.warriorcats_events.rare_flowers_bou: If a cat truly loves you... This offer will definitely turn a friendship into something else.
item.warriorcats_events.strange_shiny_st: A rare shiny gem obtained by dropping a diamond and an emerald together at night.
item.warriorcats_events.warriors_guide.t: Every warrior needs guidance at some point!
block.warriorcats_events.stone_crafting_: A rock specially designed to craft anything with your paws!
